00066 void MSDevice_FEV::buildVehicleDevices(SUMOVehicle& v,
00067         std::vector<MSDevice*> &into) {
00068     // build the device
00069     MSDevice_FEV* device = new MSDevice_FEV(v, "fev_" + v.getID());
00070     into.push_back(device);
00071 
00072 }

00077 MSDevice_FEV::MSDevice_FEV(SUMOVehicle& holder, const std::string& id) :
00078         MSDevice(holder, id),
00079 
00080         my_last_speed(0), my_curr_speed(0), my_last_charge_rem(0), my_curr_charge_rem(
00081                 0), my_last_DoD(0), my_curr_DoD(0), my_SOH(1) {
00082 }

00086 
00087 bool MSDevice_FEV::notifyMove(SUMOVehicle& veh, SUMOReal oldPos,
00088         SUMOReal newPos, SUMOReal newSpeed) {
00089     //const SUMOEmissionClass c = veh.getVehicleType().getEmissionClass();
00090 
00091     if (veh.getID().std::string::compare("t3") == 0
00092             && MSNet::getInstance()->getCurrentTimeStep() == 5100)
00093         int a = 0;
00094     if (my_last_speed < 0)
00095         my_last_speed = 0;
00096 
00097     //SUMOReal accel = (newSpeed - my_last_speed)/((1000.0/DELTA_T)*(1000.0/DELTA_T));
00098     SUMOReal accel = (newSpeed - my_last_speed) / (DELTA_T / 1000.0);
00099     double Fad = 0.5 * veh.getVehicleType().getAirDens()
00100             * veh.getVehicleType().getFrontalArea()
00101             * veh.getVehicleType().getDragCoefficient() * newSpeed * newSpeed;
00102 
00103     double slope = dynamic_cast<MSVehicle*>(&veh)->getMyLane()->getMySlope();
00104     double Fhc = veh.getVehicleType().getMass() * 9.8 * sin(slope);
00105     double Fla = 1.05 * veh.getVehicleType().getMass() * accel;
00106     double Frr = veh.getVehicleType().getRollingRes()
00107             * veh.getVehicleType().getMass() * 9.8;
00108     double Pte = (Frr + Fad + Fhc + Fla) * newSpeed;
00109     double omega = veh.getVehicleType().getGearRatio() * newSpeed;
00110     double Pbat = 0;
00111     double Pmot_out = 0;
00112     double Pmot_in = 0;
00113     double Torque = 0;
00114     double eff_mot = 0;
00115     my_last_charge_rem = my_curr_charge_rem;
00116     my_last_DoD = my_curr_DoD;
00117     my_last_speed = my_curr_speed;
00118     my_curr_speed = newSpeed;
00119 
00120     if (omega == 0) {
00121         Pte = 0;
00122         Pmot_in = 0;
00123         Torque = 0;
00124         eff_mot = 0.5;
00125     } else {
00126         if (Pte < 0)
00127             Pte = veh.getVehicleType().getRegenRatio() * Pte;
00128         if (Pte >= 0)
00129             Pmot_out = Pte / veh.getVehicleType().getGearSysEffc();
00130         else
00131             Pmot_out = Pte * veh.getVehicleType().getGearSysEffc();
00132         Torque = Pmot_out / omega;
00133         if (Torque > 0)
00134             eff_mot = (Torque * omega)
00135                     / ((Torque * omega)
00136                             + (pow(Torque, 2.0)
00137                                     * veh.getVehicleType().getCooperLosses())
00138                             + (omega * veh.getVehicleType().getIronLosses())
00139                             + (pow(omega, 3.0)
00140                                     * veh.getVehicleType().getWindageLosses())
00141                             + veh.getVehicleType().getConstantLosses());
00142         else if (Torque < 0)
00143             eff_mot = (-Torque * omega)
00144                     / ((-Torque * omega)
00145                             + (pow(Torque, 2.0)
00146                                     * veh.getVehicleType().getCooperLosses())
00147                             + (omega * veh.getVehicleType().getIronLosses())
00148                             + (pow(omega, 3.0)
00149                                     * veh.getVehicleType().getWindageLosses())
00150                             + veh.getVehicleType().getConstantLosses());
00151         if (Pmot_out >= 0)
00152             Pmot_in = Pmot_out / eff_mot;
00153         else
00154             Pmot_in = Pmot_out * eff_mot;
00155     }
00156     Pbat = Pmot_in + (DELTA_T / 1000.0) * computeElectricAuxiliaries(); //Need to include accessories.
00157 
00158             //Needs further modifications in order to include lead acid batteries.
00159     double E = veh.getVehicleType().getNumCells() * (2.15 - 0.15 * my_last_DoD);
00160     double I = 0;
00161     //Calculate internal resistance for lead acid.
00162     double Ri = (0.022 / veh.getVehicleType().getCapacity())
00163             * veh.getVehicleType().getNumCells();
00164     if (Pbat > 0) {
00165         if (4 * Ri * Pbat > E * E)
00166             int c = 0;
00167         I = (E - sqrt((E * E) - 4 * Ri * Pbat)) / (2 * Ri);
00168         double aux1 = sqrt((E * E) + 4 * Ri * Pbat);
00169         double aux2 = pow(I, 1.12);
00170         my_curr_charge_rem = my_last_charge_rem
00171                 + ((pow(I, 1.12) * (DELTA_T / 1000.0)) / 3600.0);
00172     } else {
00173         I = abs((-E + sqrt((E * E) + 4 * 2 * Ri * Pbat)) / (2 * 2 * Ri));
00174         my_curr_charge_rem = my_last_charge_rem
00175                 - ((I * (DELTA_T / 1000.0)) / 3600.0);
00176     }
00177     double PeuCap = pow(
00178             (veh.getVehicleType().getCapacity()
00179                     / veh.getVehicleType().getTimeCharge()), 1.12)
00180             * veh.getVehicleType().getTimeCharge();
00181     my_curr_DoD = my_curr_charge_rem / PeuCap;
00182     if (my_curr_DoD > 1)
00183         my_curr_DoD = 1;
00184     my_SOH = (veh.getVehicleType().getCapacity() - my_curr_charge_rem)
00185             / veh.getVehicleType().getCapacity();
00186     my_curr_E = E; //Voltage.
00187     /*if (my_SOH >1)
00188      std::cout << "asldkjas";*/
00189 
00190     /*Only for debug purpose.
00191      If in file.cfg.sumo is set on the option <tripinfo-fev value="output.xml" />
00192      will be generated a new file witt this information.
00193      */
00194 
00195     if (OptionsCont::getOptions().isSet("tripinfo-fev")) {
00196         OutputDevice& os = OutputDevice::getDeviceByOption("tripinfo-fev");
00197         (os.openTag("fev") << " ID=\"" << myID << "\" timestep=\""
00198                 << OutputDevice::realString(
00199                         MSNet::getInstance()->getCurrentTimeStep(), 6)
00200                 << "\" speedC-1=\""
00201                 << OutputDevice::realString(my_last_speed * 3.6, 6)
00202                 << "\" speedC=\""
00203                 << OutputDevice::realString(my_curr_speed * 3.6, 6)
00204                 << "\" Charge_removedC-1=\""
00205                 << OutputDevice::realString(my_last_charge_rem, 6)
00206                 << "\" Charge_removedC=\""
00207                 << OutputDevice::realString(my_curr_charge_rem, 6)
00208                 << "\" DoDC-1=\"" << OutputDevice::realString(my_last_DoD, 6)
00209                 << "\" DoDC=\"" << OutputDevice::realString(my_curr_DoD, 6)
00210                 << "\"").closeTag(true);
00211     }
00212     return true;
00213 }
00214 
00215 double MSDevice_FEV::computeMaxSpeed(double newSpeed) {
00216     if (my_last_speed < 0)
00217         my_last_speed = 0;
00218     SUMOVehicle& veh = getHolder();
00219     double res = 0;
00220     SUMOReal accel = (newSpeed - my_last_speed) / (1000.0 / DELTA_T);
00221     ;
00222     double Fad = 0.5 * veh.getVehicleType().getAirDens()
00223             * veh.getVehicleType().getFrontalArea()
00224             * veh.getVehicleType().getDragCoefficient() * newSpeed * newSpeed;
00225 
00226     double slope = dynamic_cast<MSVehicle*>(&veh)->getMyLane()->getMySlope();
00227     double Fhc = veh.getVehicleType().getMass() * 9.8 * sin(slope);
00228     double Fla = 1.05 * veh.getVehicleType().getMass() * accel;
00229     double Frr = veh.getVehicleType().getRollingRes()
00230             * veh.getVehicleType().getMass() * 9.8;
00231     double Pte = (Frr + Fad + Fhc + Fla) * newSpeed;
00232     double omega = veh.getVehicleType().getGearRatio() * newSpeed;
00233     double Pbat = 0;
00234     double Pmot_out = 0;
00235     double Pmot_in = 0;
00236     double Torque = 0;
00237     double eff_mot = 0;
00238     my_last_charge_rem = my_curr_charge_rem;
00239     my_last_DoD = my_curr_DoD;
00240     my_last_speed = my_curr_speed;
00241     my_curr_speed = newSpeed;
00242     if (veh.getID().std::string::compare("t87") == 0
00243             && MSNet::getInstance()->getCurrentTimeStep() >= 493000)
00244         int a = 0;
00245     if (omega == 0) {
00246         Pte = 0;
00247         Pmot_in = 0;
00248         Torque = 0;
00249         eff_mot = 0.5;
00250     } else {
00251         if (Pte < 0)
00252             Pte = veh.getVehicleType().getRegenRatio() * Pte;
00253         if (Pte >= 0)
00254             Pmot_out = Pte / veh.getVehicleType().getGearSysEffc();
00255         else
00256             Pmot_out = Pte * veh.getVehicleType().getGearSysEffc();
00257         Torque = Pmot_out / omega;
00258         if (Torque > 0)
00259             eff_mot = (Torque * omega)
00260                     / ((Torque * omega)
00261                             + (pow(Torque, 2.0)
00262                                     * veh.getVehicleType().getCooperLosses())
00263                             + (omega * veh.getVehicleType().getIronLosses())
00264                             + (pow(omega, 3.0)
00265                                     * veh.getVehicleType().getWindageLosses())
00266                             + veh.getVehicleType().getConstantLosses());
00267         else if (Torque < 0)
00268             eff_mot = (-Torque * omega)
00269                     / ((-Torque * omega)
00270                             + (pow(Torque, 2.0)
00271                                     * veh.getVehicleType().getCooperLosses())
00272                             + (omega * veh.getVehicleType().getIronLosses())
00273                             + (pow(omega, 3.0)
00274                                     * veh.getVehicleType().getWindageLosses())
00275                             + veh.getVehicleType().getConstantLosses());
00276         if (Pmot_out >= 0)
00277             Pmot_in = Pmot_out / eff_mot;
00278         else
00279             Pmot_in = Pmot_out * eff_mot;
00280     }
00281     Pbat = Pmot_in + computeElectricAuxiliaries(); //Need to include accessories.
00282             //Needs further modifications in order to include lead acid batteries.
00283     double E = veh.getVehicleType().getNumCells() * (2.15 - 0.15 * my_last_DoD);
00284     double I = 0;
00285     //Calcultate internal resistence for lead acid.
00286     double Ri = (0.022 / veh.getVehicleType().getCapacity())
00287             * veh.getVehicleType().getNumCells();
00288     /*my_last_charge_rem = my_curr_charge_rem;
00289      my_last_DoD = my_curr_DoD;
00290      my_last_speed = my_curr_speed;
00291      my_curr_speed = newSpeed;*/
00292     res = ((E * E) * eff_mot * veh.getVehicleType().getGearSysEffc())
00293             / (4 * Ri * Pte);
00294     if (res < newSpeed)
00295         return res;
00296     else
00297         return newSpeed;
00298 
00299 }
00306 double MSDevice_FEV::computeElectricAuxiliaries() {
00307     double res = 0;
00308     SUMOVehicle& veh = getHolder();
00309     double radio = veh.getVehicleType().getRadioConsumption();
00310     double heating_AC = veh.getVehicleType().getHeatingAcConsumption();
00311     double head_lights = veh.getVehicleType().getVehicleHeadligthsConsumption();
00312     double fog_lights = veh.getVehicleType().getFrontFogLigthsConsumption();
00313     double cockpit_lights = veh.getVehicleType().getCockpitLigthsConsumption();
00314 
00315     std::string aux_mask = veh.getVehicleType().getAuxMask();
00316     std::string ligth_mask = veh.getVehicleType().getLightMask();
00317 
00318     /*
00319      * Added for debug purposes.
00320      * WRITE_WARNING(aux_mask);
00321     WRITE_WARNING(ligth_mask);*/
00322 
00323     // Calculates the electric auxiliaries power consumption.
00324     res = radio + heating_AC + head_lights + fog_lights + cockpit_lights;
00325 
00326     return res;
00327     //Compute
00328 
00329 }
